title: Skill Up Training Institute Website
description: It showcase the feature of a Institute.Also contains the information of placed students, courses, location. It is multi routes responsive web application.

title: Jobby App
description: It is user-friendly job-seeking platform with job listings and advanced search/filtering options. Once user found a job,Jobby app provides a job description, so user can learn about the role and company.

title: Currency Converter
description: The Currency Converter allows users to easily convert currencies using the API. With a simple form, users can select the currencies, enter the amount, to get real-time exchange rates and the converted amount.

title: Amazon-Clone
description: Created a front-end clone of the Amazon e-commerce website, optimized for large screens.

title: Car Booking System
description: Managed book and return rented car. Created a feature that will displays only available cars for booking .

title: Calculator
description: First created the UI design using HTML CSS and then using JavaScript added the functionality to the calculator.

title: Analog Clock
description: First created the Design using HTML CSS and then added the functionality to the clock using JavaScript.

title: Login Website
description: Created Login website structure Design using HTML CSS
